document_data.caption: A map showing Iris Well spring near Teyla Shan.
document_data.name: Iris Well Spring
document_data.mainbody: '''Iris Well Spring''' was a small oasis and  village located just east of [[Semphar]] in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description: This area was a dreary place for much of the year, but each spring the dormant dwarf irises bloomed, surrounding the area with beautiful blue flowers.
document_data.Inhabitants: Atabeg [[Ali al-Mustasib]] and his daughter [[Dura al-Mustasib|Dura]] lived on a small farm here.
